Choose one of the following: STAT137, or STAT217.

Students considering a Child Development or Psychology minor should consider taking STAT217.

Choose one of the following: PSY201, or PSY202.

Required in Major; also satisfies GE.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D (GEOG308) should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). NOTE: Some GE may be fulfilled in concentration courses or minors. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
Declare your Concentration around this time.
